reviewText:
This is a DVD set well worth owning.  I'm testing for my first stripe on my blue belt soon.
I'm a little weak on defense.  But this package is helping to bring me up.  There's 6-12
months worth of study and integration here and I happy to have it in my collection.
I used three of the techniques so far by watching it 2 days, closed guard defense, spider guard defense, back defense. This DVD is on heavy rotation and the price is right
According to Ribeiro's 'Jujitsu University' survival is the name of the game for beginners.....this is just what i was looking for....
